trans-unit.source: Reads an XML manifest file into an object representation.
Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
Specifies an input stream.
Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream"></xref> property of the resulting manifest object.
Used by <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter"></xref> to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest"></xref> object representation of the manifest.

Can be cast to <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest"></xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest"></xref>, or <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest"></xref> to access more specific functionality.
Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
The fully qualified path name of the input file.
For example, the full path may be c:\directory\folder\filename.manifest.
Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream"></xref> property of the resulting manifest object.
Used by <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter"></xref> to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest"></xref> object representation of the manifest.

Can be cast to <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest"></xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest"></xref>, or <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest"></xref> to access more specific functionality.
Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
Specifies the expected type of the manifest.
Valid values are `AssemblyManifest`, `ApplicationManifest`, or `DeployManifest`.
Specifies an input stream.
Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream"></xref> property of the resulting manifest object.
Used by <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter"></xref> to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest"></xref> object representation of the manifest.

Can be cast to <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest"></xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest"></xref>, or <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest"></xref> to access more specific functionality.
Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
Specifies the expected type of the manifest.
Valid values are `AssemblyManifest`, `ApplicationManifest`, or `DeployManifest`.
The path name of the input file.
Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream"></xref> property of the resulting manifest object.
Used by <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter"></xref> to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest"></xref> object representation of the manifest.

Can be cast to <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest"></xref>, <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest"></xref>, or <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest"></xref> to access more specific functionality.
